English: to burn the Confucian classics and bury alive the Confucian scholars (acts supposedly committed by the first emperor `秦始皇~[Qin2 Shi3 huang2])
francais: brûler les livres et enterrer vivants les lettrés (un des crimes du premier empereur Qin Shihuang en 213 et 212 av. JC)
